word: "WHEN THE LORD SEES FIT TO GIVE A VISION, I AM TAKEN INTO THE PRESENCE OF JESUS AND ANGELS, AND AM ENTIRELY LOST TO EARTHLY THINGS. . . . MY ATTENTION IS OFTEN DIRECTED TO SCENES TRANSPIRING UPON EARTH. AT TIMES I AM CARRIED FAR AHEAD INTO THE FUTURE AND SHOWN WHAT IS TO TAKE PLACE. THEN AGAIN I AM SHOWN THINGS AS THEY HAVE OCCURRED IN THE PAST."--SPIRITUAL GIFTS, VOL. 2, P. 292.
